context_of_use: This use case allows customers to browse, search, and view detailed information about products within the e-commerce platform.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find and evaluate products easily
business owner: wants to increase sales through effective product visibility
description: This use case enables customers to browse products by category, search for products by keyword, and view detailed information about products.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer can view a list of products and their details.
assumptions: The customer has an active account to log in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays a list of products in the selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays a list of products matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System displays detailed information about the selected product.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the customer selects a sub-category, then the system displays a list of products in the selected sub-category.
AF-2 (from Step 2): If the customer enters no keyword, then the system prompts the customer to enter a valid keyword.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the system fails to retrieve products, then the system displays an error message indicating the issue.
EF-2 (from Step 2): If no products match the search keyword, then the system displays a message indicating no results found.
